for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n = input()
    
    a = map(int,raw_input().split())
    d = map(int,raw_input().split())
    a.sort()
    d.sort()
    
    ng=m = 0
    while a != []:
        if a[0] == d[0]:
            a = a[1:]
            d = d[1:]
        elif a[0] < d[0]:
            ng += 1
            a = a[1:]
            if m< ng:
                m = ng
        else:
            ng -= 1
            d = d[1:]

    print m
